name: Plan Q - Organic High-Calorie Hardgainer Plan

Breakfast.details: Organic Calorie-Dense Breakfast: 3 organic eggs, 2 organic whole grain waffles, 2 tbsp organic peanut butter, 1 organic banana, 2 tbsp organic maple syrup, 1 cup organic whole milk
Breakfast.instructions: Scramble eggs. Toast waffles and spread with peanut butter. Top with sliced banana and maple syrup. Serve with milk.

Mid-Morning Snack.details: Organic High-Calorie Smoothie: 2 scoops organic mass gainer protein powder, 1 cup organic whole milk, 1 organic banana, 1/2 cup organic oats, 2 tbsp organic almond butter, 1/4 cup organic heavy cream

Lunch.details: Organic Loaded Sandwich: 2 slices organic whole grain bread, 6 oz organic turkey breast, 2 slices organic cheese, 1 organic avocado, 2 tbsp organic mayonnaise, 1 cup organic mixed greens
Lunch.instructions: Assemble sandwich with all ingredients. Serve with a side of mixed greens.

Afternoon Snack.details: Organic Trail Mix: 1/2 cup organic mixed nuts, 1/4 cup organic dried fruit, 1/4 cup organic dark chocolate chips, 1/4 cup organic coconut flakes

Pre-Workout Snack.details: Organic Energy Balls: 1 cup organic dates, 1/2 cup organic almonds, 1/4 cup organic cocoa powder, 2 tbsp organic coconut oil, 1 scoop organic whey protein powder
Pre-Workout Snack.instructions: Process ingredients in a food processor, roll into balls.

Post-Workout Dinner.details: Organic Calorie-Packed Pasta: 2 cups cooked organic whole grain pasta, 6 oz organic ground beef, 1 cup organic tomato sauce, 1/2 cup organic grated cheese, 2 tbsp organic olive oil, 1 cup organic steamed vegetables
Post-Workout Dinner.instructions: Cook pasta. Brown beef and mix with tomato sauce. Combine with pasta, top with cheese. Serve with steamed vegetables drizzled with olive oil.

Evening Snack.details: Organic Protein Pudding: 1 cup organic whole milk, 1 scoop organic casein protein powder, 2 tbsp organic chia seeds, 1 tbsp organic honey, 1/4 cup organic granola
Evening Snack.instructions: Mix milk, protein powder, chia seeds, and honey. Refrigerate for at least 2 hours. Top with granola before serving.
